algorithm_technique: Bitmask DP: DP state represents which people have been assigned hats.
problem_summary_simple: Count ways to assign unique hats to people based on their preferences.
problem_summary_technical: Bitmask DP where dp[mask] is ways to assign hats to people represented by the mask. Iterate through hats, updating DP states.
key_insights: The constraint N <= 10 makes bitmask DP feasible.
Pre-processing hats to people mapping optimizes iteration.
The DP state transition considers assigning a hat to a person not yet assigned a hat.
